{{Description|Enrich your adventures with various in-game items through our offer for Prime members only.}}
'''Prime Gaming''' is an event where members of Amazon Prime can obtain [[Promotional Codes|codes]] to claim rewards from drops.

==Duration==
2021-07-26 – 2022-01-05

==Requirements==
*Amazon Prime membership
*[[Adventure Rank]] 2 to be able to claim the reward from your in-game inbox, but can already be redeemed at Adventure Rank 1.

<br />
<sup>'''<nowiki>**</nowiki>'''</sup> Date until when a claimed code is valid for redemption in-game or on the [https://genshin.hoyoverse.com/en/gift Code Redemption] page. For instance: Prime Gaming Bundle #2 could be claimed on Amazon Prime until 1 September 2021, but a code claimed before that date could be redeemed until 8 September 2021.
